result.title: Too slow verdict processing in Codeforces offline solving
result.content:
I was not solving problems in Codeforces for a long time. So, I wanted to get back to it. But it seems, the solutions, submitted for offline practices are too slowly processed. it takes around 2 to 4 mins for every submission.

Anyone else, having this problem or it's just me? Thanks for the clarification.
